name: BOOTLOOP_RECOVERY
description:
WebGL version is experimental and may not be perfect. For best results download the Windows version (see below)

WASD to move, hold shift to run, Click to interact.

Made for Ludum Dare 47. The theme was "Stuck in a loop."
You awake on a ship with a main computer that’s stuck in a boot loop (hah) and have to go around to determine the problem and fix it, but you can only interact with the ship during the short times when the system is up, before it fails and attempts to boot again.

You aren’t alone either.
